root.title: u.k money market give 437 mln stg help
root.body: bank england say provid money market 437 mln stg assist afternoon session bring bank total help far today 461 mln stg compar revis shortag forecast 450 mln stg central bank make purchas bank bill outright compris 120 mln stg band one 10 7/8 pct 315 mln stg band two 10 13/16 pct addit also bought two mln stg treasuri bill band two 10 13/16 pct
